mapper.sql: tContractParam.contract_param_id, tContractParam.contract_param_name, tContractParam.contract_param_describe, tContractParam.application_scope_code, tContractParam.remember_days, tContractParam.contract_rule_prefix, tContractParam.date_rule, tContractParam.contract_rule_infix, tContractParam.digit_capacity, tContractParam.contract_rule_suffix, tContractParam.company_id, tContractParam.is_enable, tContractParam.operator_id, tContractParam.create_time, tContractParam.update_time, tContractParam.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_contract_param tContractParam WHERE tContractParam.company_id in (select company_id from t_organization where org_id=#{id} and is_delete=0 and is_enable=1) and tContractParam.is_delete=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_contract_param ( contract_param_id, contract_param_name, contract_param_describe, application_scope_code, remember_days, contract_rule_prefix, date_rule, contract_rule_infix, digit_capacity, contract_rule_suffix, company_id, is_enable, operator_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{contractParamId}, #{contractParamName}, #{contractParamDescribe}, #{applicationScopeCode}, #{rememberDays}, #{contractRulePrefix}, #{dateRule}, #{contractRuleInfix}, #{digitCapacity}, #{contractRuleSuffix}, #{companyId}, #{isEnable}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete} )

INSERT INTO t_contract_param ( contract_param_id, contract_param_name, contract_param_describe, application_scope_code, remember_days, contract_rule_prefix, date_rule, contract_rule_infix, digit_capacity, contract_rule_suffix, company_id, is_enable, operator_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete ) VALUES (
( #{item.contractParamId}, #{item.contractParamName}, #{item.contractParamDescribe}, #{item.applicationScopeCode}, #{item.rememberDays}, #{item.contractRulePrefix}, #{item.dateRule}, #{item.contractRuleInfix}, #{item.digitCapacity}, #{item.contractRuleSuffix}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.isEnable}, #{item.operatorId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.isDelete} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_contract_param SET contract_param_name = #{contractParamName}, contract_param_describe = #{contractParamDescribe}, application_scope_code = #{applicationScopeCode}, remember_days = #{rememberDays}, contract_rule_prefix = #{contractRulePrefix}, date_rule = #{dateRule}, contract_rule_infix = #{contractRuleInfix}, digit_capacity = #{digitCapacity}, contract_rule_suffix = #{contractRuleSuffix}, company_id = #{companyId}, is_enable = #{isEnable}, operator_id = #{operatorId}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, is_delete = #{isDelete} WHERE contract_param_id = #{contractParamId}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_contract_param SET contract_param_name = #{item.contractParamName}, contract_param_describe = #{item.contractParamDescribe}, application_scope_code = #{item.applicationScopeCode}, remember_days = #{item.rememberDays}, contract_rule_prefix = #{item.contractRulePrefix}, date_rule = #{item.dateRule}, contract_rule_infix = #{item.contractRuleInfix}, digit_capacity = #{item.digitCapacity}, contract_rule_suffix = #{item.contractRuleSuffix}, company_id = #{item.companyId}, is_enable = #{item.isEnable}, operator_id = #{item.operatorId}, create_time = #{item.createTime}, update_time = #{item.updateTime}, is_delete = #{item.isDelete} WHERE contract_param_id = #{item.contractParamId}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_contract_param WHERE contract_param_id IN
#{contractParamId}
